content.description: The route starts with good holds and works up to a large overhang. The best way to top out is by using a slanted ledge at the base of the overhang and a crack above on the right-hand side.
content.protection: A TR anchor at the top.
content.location: The base of this route is located at approximately GPS coordinates 39.00368, -104.91998. It is on the East most side of the Hatchling's Peak meadow.

content.description:
Dive Bomb climbs straight up the overhang. There is a good ledge to rest on halfway up. Be prepared to take a huge swing when you fall.

You can set a TR anchor on a tree at the top. If you extend the anchor over the edge, be wary of rubbing when you fall and swing.
content.protection: Set a tree anchor at the top.
content.location: Dive Bomb is an overhang located on the South side of Hatchling's Peak. The overhang is visible from the meadow. The route is located at approximately GPS coordinates 39.00371,-104.92091.
